was voted comeback player of the year. DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party Saturday night as the Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. "They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents." CBS has announced. Mitt Romney , who was a 2008 Republican presidential candidate, is to appear on the program Tuesday. He is promoting the publication of the paperback version of his book, No Apology: Believe in America. This will be Mitt Romney 's second visit to the CBS broadcast. He previously sat down for an interview with David Letterman on the "Late Show" last March 2, the network noted. Also
